name: Jackpot

pages.text: A portable slot machine, how nice!$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Attacks roll 3 symbols. Matching 2 symbols (and sevens) gives an effect. Match 3 for a stronger effect. Match sevens for all the rewards!
Combine a Token Tetrahedron and Boondollars for Idiots in a Punch Designix.

pages: $(li)Diamonds give Strength and Resistance$(li)Hearts give Regeneration$(li)Spades give Strength$(li)Clubs give Haste$(li)Horseshoes give Luck$(li)Bells apply Slowness and Weakness to enemies
